name: Monophonic Hero
description:
This game created for Nokia 3310 game jam3

(https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3)

I had a nokia 3310 phone when I was 10-12 years old. I was trying to make ringtones from my friends, from booklets in the Composer app. At that time, I could not create music because I had no knowledge of music theory. When I saw this jami, it came to my mind to turn this composer app into a game. My work got easier when I saw notes amongst jam resources. I added 7 pieces of music to my game. I hope you will like it.

Note: After the jam, I will share the source codes of the game and how to add new music on this page.

Resources:

Sounds:VIRTUALLY CONDUCTED KONTAKT COMPOSER + SAMPLES

Fonts:@GIZMO199 +@SOMEPX EFFORTS PRO AND ARK 

(https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources)
